q1: Did you enjoy watching Iceland's match against Argentina in the world cup?
a1: Yes, I was rooting for Iceland. They got a good result.
q3: Which Iceland player made the goal?

a4: He would have tried the same as they did in the whole tournament, maybe they would have lost too

a5: Iceland seems to play very well in their matches and would do well against Argentina again.
